distance.tiny_subject_far: distant shot, tiny subject, wide surreal background
distance.silhouette_far: silhouette in unnatural lighting, distorted horizon
distance.face_closeup: extreme close-up with stretched perspective, unrealistic lens
distance.hole_view: scene viewed through a small hole or tunnel, warped edges
distance.infinity_depth: subject seen through an endless corridor or portal, exaggerated depth
distance.from_orbit: extremely distant perspective from space or high orbit

angle.window_peek: seen through broken or floating window
angle.tilted_angle: severely tilted Dutch angle, disoriented feel
angle.ceiling_flip: ceiling becomes floor, camera facing up from impossible angle
angle.through_mouth: scene viewed from inside a character’s open mouth
angle.from_below_water: looking up from underwater at distorted world above
angle.eyeball_view: first-person view from inside someone’s eye

pose.lying_on_floor: lying on glass above the viewer
pose.spiral_motion: body rotating or twisting like a vortex
pose.fragmented_form: body in mid-disintegration or assembling from pieces
pose.levitating_hands: floating in lotus pose with disconnected hands
pose.crawling_up_wall: moving vertically along wall like insect

composition.off_center_tension: subject clinging to frame edge, tension
composition.subject_on_edge: subject barely visible, half-cropped in motion
composition.upside_down_center: subject centered but flipped upside down
composition.subject_half_erased: half of subject fading into noise or fog
composition.hole_frame: composition framed through natural or broken hole
composition.portal_focus: centered around a glowing or dimensional portal
composition.diagonal_split: scene split diagonally into two realities

focus.lens_flare_backlight: intense lens flare from unnatural light source
focus.tunnel_view: tunnel view into a mirror world
focus.foggy_mist: dense fog with colored lights and silhouette
focus.bokeh_inversion: background is sharp while subject is blurred
focus.time_trail: subject leaving motion trail like time echo
focus.fractured_blur: blurred view as if seen through shattered glass
